sourceDesc.p: Converted from a Word document written by unknown author

list.item: convert those “,” things to just comma
for MH text files, insert corresponding MH citation

body.p: “I was surprised to find that these sticks both green & dead had the greater part of them been gnawed off by the rat (& some were nearly half an inch in diameter-) They were cut off not at a right angle with a smooth cut but by successive cuts across at the same time bending the twig down-which produced a sloping & so to speak terraced surface I did not know before that they resembled the beaver in this respect also.”
"XVI / 19 August 1853-12 February 1854 / NNPM MA 1302:22 / PE 7, p.284 vol.7; Torrey JV & JVI, p.#"
